main.description: Send an encrypted message to an MLS conversation

msgId.description: Client-generated ULID for message deduplication. MUST be included in MLS message AAD.

idempotencyKey.description: Deprecated: Use msgId instead. Client-generated UUID for idempotent request retries.

ciphertext.description: MLS encrypted message ciphertext bytes (MUST be padded to paddedSize). The actual message length MUST be encrypted inside the MLS ciphertext for recipients to strip padding.

epoch.description: MLS epoch number when message was encrypted

paddedSize.description: Padded ciphertext size in bytes. Must be 512, 1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, or multiples of 8192 up to 10MB. For metadata privacy, only this bucket size is revealed; the actual message size is encrypted inside the ciphertext.

messageId.description: Created message identifier (echoed from input msgId)

receivedAt.description: Server timestamp when message was received (bucketed to 2-second intervals)

seq.description: Server-assigned sequence number for this message. Monotonically increasing within the conversation.

epoch.description: MLS epoch number (echoed from input for client confirmation)

errors.name: NotMember
errors.description: Caller is not a member of the conversation

errors.name: InvalidAsset
errors.description: Payload or attachment pointer is invalid

errors.name: EpochMismatch
errors.description: Message epoch does not match current conversation epoch
